extendedInfo.description: Did you ever forget to check-in at one of your regular venues? If you did, isq is here to solve this problem one and for all.Based on the WiFi networks available at your favourite venues, isq will automatically check you in with Foursquare once it detects any known networks in range. Simple, useful and free.Please remember that Developers can't respond to Market comments. If you have problems using isq, just drop us a mail.

reviews.title: Handy!
reviews.comment: Take a few moments to set up your most visited venues and this app becomes a great little tool!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: How do you use this?
reviews.comment: I\'m no dummy and can figure stuff out pretty quickly but, this? I can\'t figure it out and how to get it to work. Uninstalling. Great idea but UI needs to be much more user friendly. Explanations of certain things would be really helpful.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice, but needs work. When asking to check in there\'s no \"no\" option. Max check in per location per day would be good.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Hard to figure out that top right icon is a disk for saving place. Not easy to understand. Good concept, but doesn\'t recognize without refreshing serv
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Way to go! Thank you for the quick fixes for the ssl and json parsing issues! Now works like a charm, auto check-ins are now working. More power!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: If it could come with places checkin interval then this would useful for me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: A nice idea but it doesn\'t work on my 3g slide... uninstalled till an update comes out....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Could have Gowalla integration and also check Cell IDs for places with no wifi
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Not working in my xperia x8
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I like this app! I now use foursquare again. it so easy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Did not work. Installed and added 2 locations. Went back to one of those locations, wifi connected but no auto check in. Uninstalled
reviews.author: A Google User
